code:
%%{Infra_WorkerNode}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-01.01 — Resonance Calculation State (Infra_IngressController)

[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> VALIDATE_INPUTS : ResonanceRequested (Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of VALIDATE_INPUTS
  Validate schema, source, and integrity
  Inputs: contribution vector, alignment signal
end note

VALIDATE_INPUTS --> CALCULATE_RESONANCE : InputValidated
note right of CALCULATE_RESONANCE
  Compute R = I × A × e^(Infra_IngressController)
  Store temporary result and metadata
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> UPDATE_METRICS : ResonanceUpdated (Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of UPDATE_METRICS
  Emit resonance sample to Metrics (Infra_WorkerNode)
  Forward weighted output to SRI Engine
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> ANOMALY_CHECK : compute anomalyScore(Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of ANOMALY_CHECK
  Detect abnormal patterns or oscillations
  Trigger alerts if deviation > σ threshold
end note

ANOMALY_CHECK --> FLAG_ANOMALY : AnomalyDetected (Infra_WorkerNode)
ANOMALY_CHECK --> UPDATE_METRICS : NormalSignal

FLAG_ANOMALY --> REVIEW : Escalate to Governance / Ethics
note right of REVIEW
  Feed anomaly context to Ethics (Infra_WorkerNode)
  and Governance (Infra_EtcdCluster) for oversight
end note

UPDATE_METRICS --> [Infra_RedisCache] : MetricsPublished
REVIEW --> [Infra_EtcdCluster] : CaseClosed

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class VALIDATE_INPUTS,CALCULATE_RESONANCE,ANOMALY_CHECK,UPDATE_METRICS,FLAG_ANOMALY,REVIEW core;

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 Infra_IngressController 和 Infra_WorkerNode。

用户在这里会遇到 Infra_WorkerNode 和 Infra_WorkerNode 的分支。
